cards.description: [ACTIVATED] Destroy this card and Deal 20 damage to a Champion. [TRIGGER] If this card is sent to the Grave: you can Shuffle any number of 'Compound' cards from your Grave into your Deck then Deal 10 damage to a Champion for each card returned.
[ACTIVATED] Deal 10 damage to a Champion then Destroy this card and Equip 1 'Imported' Equipment other than 'Imported Grenade' from your Grave to a Champion you control.
[ACTIVATED] Destroy all Equipment equipped to this Champion and 1 Equipment on the Field. [PASSIVE] May be equipped to any Slot.

[ACTIVATED] Deal 10 damage to this Champion and each enemy Champion then Return this card to the Hand. [TRIGGER] If this card is discarded: Flip a coin. If Heads: Deal 10 damage to each enemy Champion.
[ACTIVATED] Destroy this card and Deal 30 damage to a Champion. [TRIGGER] When this card is destroyed: Add 'Map of the Mantle' from Deck to Hand
[ACTIVATED] Deal 10 damage to this Champion then Heal 20 damage from this Champion.
[PASSIVE] This Champion takes 0 damage from Spells.
[TRIGGER] When this Champion takes damage from an opponent's Equipment: Deal 30 damage to the Champion that was equipped with that Equipment.
[TRIGGER] When this card is equipped: Add 1 'Ash of the Hearth' from Grave to Hand. [TRIGGER] When this card is destroyed: you can Equip 1 'Fuel of the Hearth' to a Champion.
[TRIGGER] When this card is equipped: Add 1 'Fuel of the Hearth' from Grave to Hand. [TRIGGER] When this card is destroyed: you can Equip 1 'Ash of the Hearth' to a Champion.
[ACTIVATED] Destroy this card and Deal 30 damage to this Champion. [PASSIVE] May be equipped to any Slot, including your opponents.
[TRIGGER] When this card is destroyed: Deal 10 damage to this Champion. [PASSIVE] May be equipped to any Slot, including your opponents.
[ACTIVATED] Destroy this card then Equip an Earth Equipment from your Grave to this Champion.
[PASSIVE] Your opponent cannot activate Trigger Effects.
[ACTIVATED] Apply the following effects based on the number of attached 'Rain' cards. 1+: Deal 10 damage to a Champion. 3+: Heal 10 damage from this Champion.
[ACTIVATED] If this card has 3 or more attached 'Rain' cards: Deal 10 damage to each enemy Champion. [PASSIVE] Cannot be destroyed.
[ACTIVATED] Apply the following effects based on the number of attached 'Rain' cards. 0-2: Add 1 'Rain' card from Grave to Hand. 3+ Deal 20 damage to a Champion.
[TRIGGER] When this card is destroyed: Attach it to your Water Equipment then if 2 or more cards were destroyed this turn Deal 20 damage to a Champion.
[ACTIVATED] Equip a 'Cloud' Equipment from your Deck to this Slot and Attach this card to it.
